name: The Door! 3 [Alpha]
description:
This game was going to be The Door! 3 yes it is still The Door! 3 But During the Development I Messed up with the project and the render pipeline of the game was some how glitched up and I was even unsatisfied to have a same game with different levels, different graphic, but nothing else new, 

SO,

Now  after The Door! 3 With maze up Update is released This is the Alpha 

As

The Door! 3 [Now In The Delump]

Since The Game is only avable for Windows, Hope you understand :)

Nitish Thombre In. Dev.
